description: Maximal consecutive determinant of n X n persymmetric matrix with entries {-1,0,+1}.
comments: A persymmetric (or Hankel) matrix has M[ i,j ] = M[ i-k,j+k ] for all i and j (matrix is constant along antidiagonals).
links: Index entries for sequences related to maximal determinants
author: _Fred Lunnon_
